subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre passed for 351 yards and 3 touchdowns as the Packers improved to 8-1 by beating the Vikings, 34-0. Favre is 1,105 yards from breaking Dan Marino’s N.F.L. career record.
snippet: Brett Favre passed for 351 yards and 3 touchdowns as the Packers improved to 8-1 by beating the Vikings, 34-0. Favre is 1,105 yards from breaking Dan Marino’s N.F.L. career record.
